verses.text: Seek \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, \w neither|strong="H0408"\w* \w desire|strong="H0183"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w*:

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w mind|strong="H3820"\w* studieth robberies, \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* deceits.

\w By|strong="H3559"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \w the|strong="H1129"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H1004"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w by|strong="H3559"\w* prudence \w it|strong="H3559"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H1004"\w* strengthened.

\w By|strong="H3605"\w* instruction \w the|strong="H3605"\w* storerooms shall \w be|strong="H3605"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w precious|strong="H3368"\w* \w and|strong="H3605"\w* most beautiful \w wealth|strong="H1952"\w*.

\w A|strong="H0376"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w is|strong="H0376"\w* \w strong|strong="H5797"\w*: \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H0376"\w* knowing \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, stout \w and|strong="H0376"\w* valiant.

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w* \w is|strong="H3588"\w* managed \w by|strong="H3588"\w* due ordering: \w and|strong="H4421"\w* \w there|strong="H7230"\w* shall \w be|strong="H3588"\w* safety where \w there|strong="H7230"\w* \w are|strong="H4421"\w* \w many|strong="H7230"\w* \w counsels|strong="H8458"\w*.

\w Wisdom|strong="H2454"\w* \w is|strong="H6310"\w* \w too|strong="H3808"\w* \w high|strong="H7311"\w* \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3808"\w* \w fool|strong="H0191"\w*, \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w open|strong="H6605"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.
\w He|strong="H2803"\w* \w that|strong="H7121"\w* deviseth \w to|strong="H7121"\w* do evils, \w shall|strong="H1167"\w* be \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w a|strong="H7121"\w* fool.

\w The|strong="H8441"\w* thought \w of|strong="H0120"\w* a fool \w is|strong="H0120"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*: \w and|strong="H0120"\w* \w the|strong="H8441"\w* detracter \w is|strong="H0120"\w* \w the|strong="H8441"\w* \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* \w of|strong="H0120"\w* \w men|strong="H0120"\w*.

If thou lose hope being weary \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w distress|strong="H6869"\w*, thy \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* diminished.

\w Deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w them|strong="H3947"\w* \w that|strong="H0518"\w* are led \w to|strong="H0518"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w*: \w and|strong="H3947"\w* those \w that|strong="H0518"\w* are drawn \w to|strong="H0518"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w* forbear \w not|strong="H0518"\w* \w to|strong="H0518"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* thou \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w strength|strong="H5315"\w* enough: \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* seeth \w into|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w heart|strong="H5315"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* understandeth, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* deceiveth \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w keeper|strong="H5341"\w* \w of|strong="H5315"\w* thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w render|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* according \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* works.

Fat \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* honeycomb most \w sweet|strong="H4966"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* thy throat:

\w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w also|strong="H3045"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* doctrine \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \w to|strong="H5315"\w* thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*: which \w when|strong="H0518"\w* thou hast \w found|strong="H4672"\w*, thou shalt \w have|strong="H3426"\w* \w hope|strong="H8615"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w end|strong="H0319"\w*, \w and|strong="H2451"\w* thy \w hope|strong="H8615"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w perish|strong="H3772"\w*.

\w Lie|strong="H0693"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w in|strong="H0693"\w* \w wait|strong="H0693"\w*, \w nor|strong="H0408"\w* seek after wickedness \w in|strong="H0693"\w* \w the|strong="H0408"\w* house \w of|strong="H7563"\w* \w the|strong="H0408"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w*, \w nor|strong="H0408"\w* spoil \w his|strong="H0408"\w* rest.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w* mall \w shall|strong="H7563"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w times|strong="H7651"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w shall|strong="H7563"\w* \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* \w again|strong="H6965"\w*: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w shall|strong="H7563"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \w into|strong="H5307"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*.

\w When|strong="H5307"\w* thy \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w* \w shall|strong="H3820"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*, \w be|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w glad|strong="H8055"\w*, \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w in|strong="H5307"\w* \w his|strong="H0408"\w* ruin \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* thy \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w*:

\w Lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* displease \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

Contend \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w with|strong="H7065"\w* \w the|strong="H0408"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, \w nor|strong="H0408"\w* seek \w to|strong="H7563"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* like \w the|strong="H0408"\w* \w ungodly|strong="H7563"\w*:

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w men|strong="H7563"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* hope \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w things|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w*, \w and|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w lamp|strong="H5216"\w* \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w put|strong="H1846"\w* \w out|strong="H1846"\w*.

\w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w nothing|strong="H0408"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H0408"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* detracters.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w destruction|strong="H0343"\w* \w shall|strong="H4310"\w* \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* \w suddenly|strong="H6597"\w*: \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* knoweth \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w ruin|strong="H6365"\w* \w of|strong="H8147"\w* \w both|strong="H8147"\w*?

\w These|strong="H0428"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w*: \w It|strong="H6440"\w* \w is|strong="H1571"\w* \w not|strong="H1571"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w respect|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* persons \w in|strong="H1571"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*.

\w They|strong="H0559"\w* \w that|strong="H0559"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w man|strong="H7563"\w*: Thou art \w just|strong="H6662"\w*: \w shall|strong="H7563"\w* \w be|strong="H7563"\w* \w cursed|strong="H2194"\w* \w by|strong="H7563"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H6662"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* tribes \w shall|strong="H7563"\w* \w abhor|strong="H2194"\w* \w them|strong="H0859"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H0935"\w* \w rebuke|strong="H3198"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, shall be praised: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.
\w He|strong="H7725"\w* \w shall|strong="H1697"\w* kiss \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*, who answereth \w right|strong="H5228"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w Prepare|strong="H3559"\w* thy \w work|strong="H4399"\w* without, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* diligently till thy \w ground|strong="H7704"\w*: \w that|strong="H3559"\w* \w afterward|strong="H0310"\w* thou mayst \w build|strong="H1129"\w* thy \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* \w without|strong="H2600"\w* \w cause|strong="H2600"\w* \w against|strong="H7453"\w* thy neighbour: \w and|strong="H7453"\w* deceive \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w any|strong="H1961"\w* man \w with|strong="H1961"\w* thy \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*.

\w Say|strong="H0559"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w*: \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H7725"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w*: \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w render|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w according|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w work|strong="H6467"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* slothful \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* foolish \w man|strong="H0376"\w*:

\w And|strong="H6440"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w it|strong="H6440"\w* \w was|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* filled \w with|strong="H3680"\w* \w nettles|strong="H2738"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* thorns had \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* thereof, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* \w wall|strong="H1444"\w* \w was|strong="H3605"\w* \w broken|strong="H2040"\w* \w down|strong="H2040"\w*.

\w Which|strong="H4148"\w* \w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* had \w seen|strong="H7200"\w*, \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w laid|strong="H7896"\w* \w it|strong="H7200"\w* \w up|strong="H7200"\w* \w in|strong="H7200"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w by|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* example \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w received|strong="H3947"\w* \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w*.

Thou wilt \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w* \w a|strong="H4592"\w* \w little|strong="H4592"\w*, said \w I|strong="H7901"\w*, thou wilt \w slumber|strong="H8572"\w* \w a|strong="H4592"\w* \w little|strong="H4592"\w*, thou wilt fold thy \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H4592"\w* \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w rest|strong="H7901"\w*:

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w poverty|strong="H7389"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* thee \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* runner, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* beggary \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w an|strong="H0935"\w* \w armed|strong="H4043"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*.
